principle.name: Data Privacy First
principle.description: Always anonymize PII in all data flows and use encryption for ETL/MCP/integrations
principle.rationale: Handles sensitive data across BI/CRM/agent workflows

principle.name: Compliance Adherence
principle.description: Ensure GDPR/CCPA/SOC2 compliance in all flows, including MCP memory and vector storage

principle.name: Idempotent Operations
principle.description: Design all ETL/MCP ops to be retryable without duplication
principle.rationale: Prevents inconsistencies in BI/MCP during failures

principle.name: Workflow Efficiency
principle.description: Optimize for MCP/ETL/agent orchestration with batching and hybrid search

convention.rule: Use Airbyte for ETL workflows with connector-based scheduling for all data sources

examples.good: Airbyte connection for CRM → MCP memory → BI
